Package mods.railcraft.api.carts

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAlternateCartTexture
    Used to render a cart with a custom texture using Railcraft's cart renderer.
    ICartContentsTextureProvider
    Used by the renderer to renders blocks in carts.
    IEnergyTransfer
    This interface is implemented by the Energy Cart and is used by the Energy Loaders to charge/discharge carts.
    IExplosiveCart  
    IItemTransfer
    This interface allows items to be passed around with out needing to know anything about the underlying implementation of the inventories.
    ILinkableCart
    This interface should be implemented by any minecart that wishes to change the default linkage behavior.
    ILinkageManager
    The LinkageManager contains all the functions needed to link and interact with linked carts.
    ILiquidTransfer
    This interface allows carts to transfer liquid between each other as well as adding a couple other functions related to liquids.
    IMinecart
    Some helper functions to make interacting with carts simpler.
    IPaintedCart  
    IRefuelableCart
    This is used for the "NeedsRefuel" routing conditional.
    IRoutableCart  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CartTools
